thread.title: Buy Commercial Property for the Income, Study Says

author: WSJ Real Estate
title: Buy Commercial Property for the Income, Study Says
text:
COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE Buy Commercial Property for the Income, Study Says Commercial real estate is a good investment for income not, as most investors believe, rising property prices, according to a new study.
Construction Cranes Spring Up Across Europe as Development Soars
Building cranes are appearing in greater numbers in some European cities than they have at any other time since the 2008 global financial crisis. Commercial-property development is on the rise, spurred by Europe’s strengthening economy and investors’... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
